messages.messageBody:
> And there are millions of people who claim to believe and follow every word
> of the Bible as the literal word of God without having even read it.

Now that's the one I don't get. I could never tell people I believe every
word of the Bible is the literal word of God. I have read well over half
the books. But there are several books I have doubts I'll ever get through.

With all the great literature in the world, and all the great religious
writings both in and out of the Bible, why would I want to slog through some
piece of it I don't enjoy? And how could I ever claim to believing
something I can't tolerate reading?!?!

brenda
your classic example of a good episcopalian, aka bad christian to some! <g>
